description: 5:00PM-7:00PM at Baja Cantina 311 Washington Blvd Venice CA 90292. Enjoy a relaxed and stylish atmosphere while connecting with Venice Chamber members and prospective members. Complimentary small bites and drink specials. Contact: Mario and Karin 310-822-5425 info@venicechamber.net. Cost: $15 for members.

11:00AM-2:00PM (Shift: 9:30AM-3:00PM) at 2951 28th Street Santa Monica CA 90405. Staff: Brandon & Zu. Health Fair and Open Enrollment event for JAKKS Pacific employees only (250 employees). Table set up with spin to win wheel. Tables and chairs provided by organizer. Indoor event. Free to attend. Contact: Trish Ryan 424-268-9512 trishr@jakks.net. HSO and Naomi not required.

organizer: Poinsettia City Cat Club (CFA Southwest Region)
description: 9:30AM-4:30PM at Glendale Civic Auditorium. Shifts: Laurence (opening) 8:00AM-4:00PM; Ervin (closing) 9:30AM-5:30PM; HSO confirmed; Naomi confirmed. Cat show featuring various breeds and household pets. Booths with cat toys supplies and apparel. Local rescue adoptions. Booth #13 Prime Spot 10x10 $70. 300-500+ spectators. Demographics: Middle age families and young creatives 20s-30s. ~10 vendors. Indoor event. Provided: chairs and 1 8ft table. Staff minimum: 3. Contact: Lisa 818-269-3756; Lee jnglecats@aol.com 805-585-0559. Payment due by 11/7.

11AM-3PM (Shift: 10AM-4PM) at Dog PPL. Staff: ? Brittany Dr. Celestine Ho. DOG PPL members-only vaccine pop-up. Onsite clinic for vaccines plus marketing spin to win wheel. Marketing materials and clinic supplies (set team knows what to bring). Contact: Milan milan@dogppl.co.

9:00AM-9:45AM. Virtual - Zoom link sent upon registration. Free casual meetup to sip share and support one another. Bring your favorite coffee or tea. Tips to share or challenges to navigate. Contact: Mario and Karin 310-822-5425 info@venicechamber.net. Cost: Free.

9:30AM-10:30AM at Sherman Oaks Encino Chamber Office 4933 Balboa Blvd Encino CA 91316. Stop by to enjoy conversation and connect with others to collaborate. Contact: Vickie 818-906-1951 hello@shermanoakschamber.org. Cost: Free with RSVP by 11/18.

10AM-6PM at Venice Blvd & Grand View Blvd 90066. Shift 1: 8:15AM-4:45PM Mellisa & Alysia. Shift 2: 10:30AM-7PM Laurence & Brittany. Dre help 4:30-6PM. HSO confirmed. Naomi confirmed. Winter wonderland celebration with activities food and live entertainment. Booth #119 YELLOW Zone. Booth Cost: $725.50. Outdoor event - full setup required: tent chairs table marketing supplies. Load-in 7:30-8:30AM via Inglewood Blvd (3771 Inglewood Blvd LA 90066). No power/internet provided. Bring own 32-gal+ trash cans. $500 cleaning fee if trash left. Contact: Silvia silvia@thevenicefest.com. Payment confirmed 11/19/25.

event_name: Dog Days at Del Rey Lounge
description: Every Monday 2:30PM-6:00PM at Marina del Rey Hotel. Doggie Happy Hour - bring furry friends for fun relaxation and special treats. Discounted drinks while pups mingle in outdoor bar area. Dogs welcome all day; drink specials extend after 6PM. Contact: Rosado mrosado@marinadelreyhotel.com. Inquiring details - called 11/3 left VM and emailed.

6PM-9PM at Windward & Pacific Ave. Shift 1: 12:30PM-8:30PM Jenn Laura. Shift 2: 2:00PM-10:00PM Laurence Brandon. HSO confirmed. 14th annual Venice Sign holiday lighting. Street closures for live music and family-friendly activities. Booth Cost: $750. 5000 people expected. 25 vendors. Space: 10x10. Provided: 1 table (6ft or 8ft) 2 chairs white tent. Bring: brand tablecloths signage extra chairs marketing supplies power charger. Contact: George gianfrancisco@hotmail.com 310-994-1151.

11AM-3PM (Shift: 10AM-4PM) at Dog PPL. Staff: Alysia Alexei Dr. Ho. DOG PPL members-only vaccine pop-up. Onsite clinic for vaccines plus marketing spin to win wheel. Marketing materials and clinic supplies (set team knows what to bring). Contact: Milan milan@dogppl.co.

9:00AM-12:00PM at Conejo Creek North. Setup by 8:30AM cleaned up by 2:00PM. Biggest dog festival in Ventura County. Contests (costume big/littlest dog) dog racetrack entertainers agility course cool off zone DIY dog area. Dog-specific vendors food and drinks. Outdoor event. Booth Cost: $30 for 10x10. Deadline to apply 2/20/26. Full setup required: tent chairs tables. Hundreds of local families and dog lovers expected. Free parking in designated areas only. Food vendors on-site. Physical presence required for company awareness on valley side.

11AM-7PM at Windward Circle and the Boardwalk in Venice Beach CA. Free community event with live music food trucks 400+ locally made brands/artists beer gardens games. 100000+ visitors expected. Outdoor event. Physical presence required - also designated First-Aid Pet Tent for festival. Bring own GDD branded tent chairs merch promo supplies. Street parking; unloading at entrance then find street parking. Self-park stations available at own cost. Food vendors on-site.

event_name: Dog PPL Pop-Up Clinics + First Aid Talk
description: 11AM-3PM (Shift: 10AM-4PM) at Dog PPL. Pop-Up Clinic Staff: Dr. Hoh or Dr. V + Alexei + Alysia. First Aid Talk Staff: Doc + Dejia. DOG PPL members-only vaccine pop-up plus First Aid Talk by Doc on basic first aid for pet parents in new clubhouse starting at 12PM. Marketing spin to win wheel. Contact: Milan milan@dogppl.co.

10AM-6PM at 1101 W McKinley Ave Pomona CA 91768. Largest pet show in the world - multi-species expo combining Bird Reptile Aquarium and Succulent expos. Indoor event potentially in Reptile Expo building. Booth: $350 single (1 8ft table 1 chair 1 vendor pass) or $395 corner (2 8ft tables 1 chair 1 vendor pass). Extra chairs $5 each. Electricity $50. Additional vendor passes $30. 5000+ foot traffic. Physical presence for hospital/exotics department advertising. Parking lot at a fee (shared with public). Food vendors at Pomona Fairplex.

11AM-5PM at 1101 W McKinley Ave Pomona CA 91768. Day 2 of the largest pet show in the world - multi-species expo combining Bird Reptile Aquarium and Succulent expos. Indoor event. Same booth setup as Day 1. See Day 1 entry for full details.
